SELECT A.BIN_SaleRecordID AS prePayBillMainId, A.BillCode AS prePayNo, B.DepartCode AS departCode, B.DepartName AS departName, A.MobilePhone AS telephone, A.SaleDate AS prePayDate, A.SaleTime AS prePayTime, A.Amount AS prePayAmount, A.Quantity AS buyQuantity, A.PickupQuantity AS pickupQuantity, ISNULL(A.Quantity,0)-ISNULL(A.PickupQuantity,0) AS leftQuantity, A.PickupDate AS pickupDate, COUNT(D.BIN_PickupBillMainID) AS pickupTimes, E.EmployeeCode AS employeeCode, E.EmployeeName AS employeeName, A.SaleType AS transactionType, CASE WHEN A.SaleType='NS' THEN 1 WHEN A.SaleType='SR' THEN -1 END AS computeSign FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_EmployeeID = E.BIN_EmployeeID) LEFT JOIN Sale.BIN_PickupBillMain D WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_SaleRecordID = D.BIN_SaleRecordID) WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BillModel in('4','5') AND EXISTS ( AND B.BIN_OrganizationID = A99.BIN_OrganizationID)
A.BillCode LIKE '%' + #prePayNo# + '%'
A.MobilePhone LIKE '%' + #phoneNo# + '%'
A.Amount >= #prePayAmountStart#
A.Amount <= #prePayAmountEnd#
A.SaleDate >= #prePayStartDate#
A.SaleDate <= #prePayEndDate#
A.PickupDate >= #pickUpStartDate# AND A.PickupDate is not NULL
A.PickupDate <= #pickUpEndDate# AND A.PickupDate is not NULL
1=1
A.PickupDate >= #pickUpStartDate# AND A.PickupDate is not NULL
A.PickupDate <= #pickUpEndDate# AND A.PickupDate is not NULL
OR A.PickupDate IS NULL
GROUP BY A.BIN_SaleRecordID,A.BillCode,B.DepartCode,B.DepartName, A.MobilePhone, A.SaleDate, A.SaleTime, A.Amount, A.Quantity, A.PickupQuantity, A.PickupDate, E.EmployeeCode, E.EmployeeName, A.SaleType
